dialogues.Text: The sun is out, the birds are singing… And it looks like it’s warm outside!
If I’m right, I should already have enough money to improve the restaurant…
Luckily, I will be able to hire waiters!
I still cannot believe I’m fulfilling my dream…
Mom! Dad! DId you hear that?
I knew I would make it… Hahah!
Thank you all so much for coming to the restaurant’s reopening.
I hope you are enjoying the food. We prepared everything with lots of love!
I wouldn’t have been able to make it without all of your visits.
Thank you for coming to eat here. I hope you don’t get tired of doing so!
Well, I won’t bother you anymore. Enjoy your meal!
